Uses of MovementPattern in model.pieces.types
 

Classes in model.pieces.types that implement MovementPattern
 class BishopPattern
          Implements the MovementPattern of a standard chess bishop.
 class JumpingPattern
          MovementPattern used for pieces that can jump to set offsets without caring what's between where it is and the resulting position.
 class KnightPattern
          Implements a standard Chess knight pattern.
 class LinePattern
          Defines a general pattern for pieces that move in straight lines.
 class MultiPattern
          Creates a MovementPattern from multiple MovementPatterns.
 class PawnPattern
          A pattern that allows movement like a regular chess pawn.
 class QueenPattern
          Defines the MovementPattern for a standard chess queen.
 class RookPattern
          Defines the MovementPattern for a standard chess rook.
 class SimplifiedKingPattern
          The simplified chess king movement pattern.
